Validation.MaxLength: The value is too long. Use up to {0} symbols

PasswordRequiresDigit: Password must contain at least one digit ('0' - '9').
PasswordRequiresLower: Password must contain at least one letter ('a' - 'z').
PasswordRequiresNonAlphanumeric: The password must contain at least one special. symbol.
PasswordRequiresUpper: Password must contain at least one letter ('A' - 'Z').
